mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USERMANAGER_BOARD(ID, PASSWORD, NAME, DEPARTMENT, MAIL, PHONE, ADDRESS, REGDATE) VALUES(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{department}, #{mail}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{regdate})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_HEALTHY_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, WRITER = #{writer}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATEDATE = sysdate WHERE NUM = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_USERMANAGER_BOARD ORDER BY NUM DESC
